biotools.summary: BugBuilder is a pipeline for the automated assembly and annotation of microbial genomes from high-throughput sequence data. It is configurable so as not to be tied to any assembler or scaffolder, and is designed to run in a cluster environment facilitating high-throughput processing of genomes.

bioschemas.name: BugBuilder
